org.janusgraph.core

Class Connection

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.janusgraph.core.Connection

  • public class Connection
extends Object
    Connection contains schema constraints from outgoing vertex to incoming vertex through an edge.
    Author:
    Jan Jansen (jan.jansen@gdata.de)
